short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users to rate and comment RM adverts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Submit and view anonymous comments and ratings on any Right Move property page.

This extension adds a button to your browser toolbar. Click the extension icon to view the most popular properties.

The extension embeds a rating and comment section on each property page on rightmove.co.uk
